EmailTemplate.textOnly: We’re flipping the script on nurse retention Our virtual nursing solution is having a positive impact on some of the biggest challenges facing hospitals and health systems today—like staffing shortages and nurse burnout. See for yourself what our hospital and health system partners are achieving through the fastest-growing segment of virtual care: - A health system credited virtual nursing as a major factor in achieving a 1.2-day reduction in average length of stay - One partner suspended recruiting for its virtual nursing positions because it was overwhelmed with qualified applicants - And much more About Teladoc Health: Teladoc Health is transforming the healthcare experience and empowering people everywhere to live healthier lives. Recognized as the world leader in whole-person virtual care, Teladoc Health leverages more than a decade of expertise and data-driven insights to meet the growing virtual care needs of consumers and healthcare professionals.
